name: FoxPUG
tagline: The Fox Valley Python User Group
body:
We are the Fox Valley Python User Group. We meet on the first Monday of the month, in Oshkosh, WI.

## Meetings

The Fox Valley Python User Group meets on the first Monday of the month, from 7 pm to 8:30 pm.
We meet in Sage Hall, room 4422, on the UW-Oshkosh campus.That’s the GIS computer lab in Sage Hall, on the fourth floor.

## Parking

Parking is available on High Avenue, in front of the Axle Tech factory. It costs 75¢/hr. Don’t park in the Sage Hall lot without a University parking permit.


Schedule

Here’s the schedule for the rest of 2014, and for 2015

Google calendar

iCal

April 6, 2015
May 4, 2015
June 1, 2015
July 6, 2015
August 3, 2015
September 14, 2015 (one week later than normal)
October 5, 2015
November 2, 2015
December 7, 2015

We focus on the Python programming language, and the many libraries and frameworks written in Python. We welcome all people, of different skill levels and interests. Come learn and share your knowledge.
